dc_description_s: This point shapefile contains the locations of hospital heliports in California as of 2015. Each location is supplied along with the links to the heliport info sheets that provide permitted approach paths and other information for all the permitted Hospital Heliports in California. The information will be helpful to emergency planners, helicopter operators, and other users. This layer is part of a collection of GIS data created by the California Department of Transportation (Caltrans).This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
